Class CMBoard

java.lang.Object
  edu.mccc.cos210.cmwar.CMBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Board
public class CMBoard
extends Object
implements Board

CMBoard for Circuit Maker with AutoRoute A board has Components and Connections, and manages them.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Rohit Kumar
To Do:
implement two sided boards vs single sided in model, implement autoRoute() method, implement ripUp() method, implement load() method, implement save() method, implement undo / redo
